title: Buying RP problem
body:
So, I just got my debit card and I tried to buy RP using it but it seems I did it wrong enough times last night that I now have to wait 24 hours till I can try again. The thing is I just tried this morning so does that push it back even further?
Halp.

replies.body: Our billing team can look into your issue individually to see what's going on with your payment method.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll reply back asap!
